misaka:ISShield.NAME: I.S. Shield
misaka:ISShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! I.S. Swords into your hand.

misaka:Charge.NAME: Charge
misaka:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Charge !M! cards from your hand.

misaka:Tap.NAME: Tap
misaka:Tap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Programmed card to your hand.

misaka:LightningStorm.NAME: Lightning Storm
misaka:LightningStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Charge+

misaka:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
misaka:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Bounce to opposite charge !M! times.

misaka:ISPuppet.NAME: I.S. Puppet
misaka:ISPuppet.DESCRIPTION: Deploy an I.S. Puppet. NL Add !M! I.S. Swords into your hand.

misaka:Indexing.NAME: Indexing
misaka:Indexing.DESCRIPTION: Program !M! cards from your draw pile.

misaka:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: For every !M! cards played this turn, gain

misaka:AlternatingCurrent.NAME: Alternating Current
misaka:AlternatingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Charge+ every other card in your hand. NL Charge- the rest.

misaka:BehindEnemyLines.NAME: Behind Enemy Lines
misaka:BehindEnemyLines.DESCRIPTION: Destroy ALL Deployed Trinkets. NL Deal !D! damage to adjacent enemies.

misaka:Suspend.NAME: Suspend
misaka:Suspend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemies attracted to your target take !M! damage.

misaka:Level6Shift.NAME: Level 6 Shift
misaka:Level6Shift.DESCRIPTION: Program your draw pile. NL Exhaust all cards on play.

misaka:ISSword.NAME: I.S. Sword
misaka:ISSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attracted: Deal !D! damage. NL Repelled: Gain !B! Block.
